MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH39 and EH41 postcode areas of North Berwick and Haddington. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:02am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a grounded overhead cable near to Kinduff Farm affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:45 PM on Thursday, 21 January 2021.
